Package services

Class AdminService

Object
AdminService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdminService
public class AdminService extends Object implements IAdminService
The AdminService class provides administrative functionalities related to the management of staff, branches, and payment methods for FOMS. It implements the IAdminService interface, offering methods to add, remove, and update staff records, manage branch operations, and handle payment methods. This class serves as a central point for administrative actions that affect the staffing and operational capabilities of branches, ensuring that business rules and constraints are adhered to during various management tasks.

    • addStaff

      public boolean addStaff(BranchUser staff)
      Adds a new staff member to the system. The staff member is only added to the system if the staff quota for the branch is not exceeded and the branch has the required manager to staff ratio. An account is also created for the new staff member with a default password of "password".
      Specified by:
      addStaff in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member to be added
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was added successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff role is neither BRANCHMANAGER nor STAFF.

    • removeStaff

      public boolean removeStaff(BranchUser staff)
      Removes a staff member from the system. Similar to addition, the staff member is only removed if the branch has the required manager to staff ratio after the removal. The staff member's account is also deleted from the system.
      Specified by:
      removeStaff in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(BranchUser staff)
      Updates the information of a staff member. Only to be called when editing Name, Age and Gender. Role and BranchID are not allowed to be changed without checks. Staff ID is not allowed to be changed.
      Specified by:
      updateStaff in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      staff - the BranchUser object representing the staff member to be updated
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • promoteStaff

      public boolean promoteStaff(BranchUser staff)
      Promotes a staff member to a branch manager. The promotion is only successful if the branch has the required manager to staff ratio after the promotion.
      Specified by:
      promoteStaff in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member to be promoted
      Returns:
      true if the promotion is successful, false otherwise

    • transferStaff

      public boolean transferStaff(BranchUser[] staffList, Branch oldBranch, Branch newBranch)
      Transfers staff members from one branch to another. The transfer is only successful if the staff members can be accommodated in the new branch without exceeding the staff quota and the required manager to staff ratio is maintained in both branches. Can support transferring one or multiple staff members at once.
      Specified by:
      transferStaff in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      staffList - an array of BranchUser objects representing the staff members to be transferred
      oldBranch - the branch from which the staff members are being transferred
      newBranch - the branch to which the staff members are being transferred
      Returns:
      true if the transfer is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the staff role is neither BRANCHMANAGER nor STAFF

    • addBranch

      public boolean addBranch(Branch branch)
      Adds a new branch to the system. Duplicate branch names are not allowed.
      Specified by:
      addBranch in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch to be added
      Returns:
      true if the branch was successfully added, false if the branch already exists

    • removeBranch

      public boolean removeBranch(Branch branch)
      Removes a branch from the system. This method removes the branch from the branch storage, deletes all associated orders and branch menu items. If the branch does not exist, it prints a message and returns false. If branch still contains staff, it will send a warning before removing all staff from the branch and system.
      Specified by:
      removeBranch in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      branch - the branch to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the branch is successfully removed, false otherwise

    • addPaymentMethod

      public boolean addPaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Adds a payment method to the system. Duplicate payment names are not allowed, even across different payment types.
      Specified by:
      addPaymentMethod in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - the payment method to be added
      Returns:
      true if the payment method was successfully added, false otherwise

    • removePaymentMethod

      public boolean removePaymentMethod(PaymentMethod paymentMethod)
      Removes a payment method from the system.
      Specified by:
      removePaymentMethod in interface IAdminService
      Parameters:
      paymentMethod - the payment method to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the payment method was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws AccountNotFoundException, PasswordMismatchException, PasswordValidationException
      Changes the password of a staff member.
      Parameters:
      user - the staff member whose password is to be changed
      oldPassword - the old password of the staff member
      newPassword - the new password to be set
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - if the account is not found
      PasswordMismatchException - if the old password provided does not match the account's current password
      PasswordValidationException - if the new password is invalid

    • createBranch

      public boolean createBranch(String branchName, String branchLocation, int staffQuota)
      Creates a new branch in the system.
      Parameters:
      branchName - the name of the branch
      branchLocation - the location of the branch
      staffQuota - the maximum number of staff members that can be accommodated at the branch
      Returns:
      true if the branch was successfully created, false otherwise
